segments.text: The woman seems so serene, but I can’t help but feel a rising frustration.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not see the overflowing sink? It’s a disaster waiting to happen!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her absorbed concentration on drying a plate is almost infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, her children are plotting their cookie heist right behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the boy balancing precariously, looking so proud of himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, the moment feels dangerously close to disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish she’d just turn around and notice the storm brewing in her kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR
